content.raw:
We survived but are afraid of going through withdrawal pains with no emails from Bit Bucket about issues and commits. So there is a new place on Bit Bucket to congregate. 

**[Space Robotics Survivors](https://bitbucket.org/spaceroboticssurvivors/)**

The gang on Facebook wanted to discuss and share the techniques used during the competition so we could all learn more about ROS. All are welcome to join. 

We'll use issues, wiki and the repository for sharing information.
content.html:
We survived but are afraid of going through withdrawal pains with no emails from Bit Bucket about issues and commits. So there is a new place on Bit Bucket to congregate.

Space Robotics Survivors

The gang on Facebook wanted to discuss and share the techniques used during the competition so we could all learn more about ROS. All are welcome to join.

We'll use issues, wiki and the repository for sharing information.
